verses.verse: <S%G4771><s%> But Thou <S%G1161><s%> Speak <S%G2980><s%> The Things That <S%G3739><s%> Become <S%G4241><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sound <S%G5198><s%> Teaching : The <S%G1319><s%>

Aged Men <S%G4246><s%> Sober <S%G3524><s%> To Be, <S%G1511><s%> Grave, <S%G4586><s%> Discreet, <S%G4998><s%> Sound <S%G5198><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Faith, <S%G4102><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Love, <S%G26><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Endurance; <S%G5281><s%>

The Aged <S%G4247><s%> Women In Like Manner <S%G5615><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Deportment <S%G2688><s%> As Becomes Sacred Ones, <S%G2412><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Slanderers, <S%G1228><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Wine <S%G3631><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> Enslaved, <S%G1402><s%> Teachers Of What Is Right; <S%G2567><s%>
That <S%G2443><s%> They May School <S%G4994><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Young Women <S%G3501><s%> Lovers Of Their Husbands <S%G5362><s%> To Be, <S%G1511><s%> Lovers Of Their Children, <S%G5388><s%>

Discreet, <S%G4998><s%> Chaste, <S%G53><s%> Keepers At Home, <S%G3626><s%> Good, <S%G18><s%> Subject <S%G5293><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Their Own <S%G2398><s%> Husbands, <S%G435><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> May Be Evil Spoken Of. <S%G987><s%>
The <S%G3588><s%> Younger <S%G3501><s%> Men In Like Manner <S%G5615><s%> Exhort <S%G3870><s%> To Be Discreet; <S%G4993><s%>

In <S%G4012><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Thyself <S%G4572><s%> Holding Forth <S%G3930><s%> A Pattern <S%G5179><s%> Of Good <S%G2570><s%> Works; <S%G2041><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Teaching <S%G1319><s%> , Uncorruptness, <S%G90><s%> Gravity, <S%G4587><s%> , Incorruption, <S%G861><s%>

Speech <S%G3056><s%> Sound, <S%G5199><s%> Not To Be Condemned; <S%G176><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1537><s%> He Who Is Opposed <S%G1727><s%> May Be Ashamed, <S%G1788><s%> Nothing <S%G3367><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> To Say <S%G3004><s%> Evil. <S%G5337><s%>

Bondmen <S%G1401><s%> To Their Own <S%G2398><s%> Masters <S%G1203><s%> To Be Subject, <S%G5293><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Everything <S%G3956><s%> Well Pleasing <S%G2101><s%> To Be, <S%G1511><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Contradicting <S%G483><s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> Purloining, <S%G3557><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Fidelity <S%G4102><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Shewing <S%G1731><s%> Good, <S%G18><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Teaching <S%G1319><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%> Of Your <S%G5216><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> They May Adorn <S%G2885><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All Things. <S%G3956><s%>

<S%G2014><s%> For Appeared <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Brings Salvation <S%G4992><s%> For All <S%G3956><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%>

Instructing <S%G3811><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> That, <S%G2443><s%> Having Denied <S%G720><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ungodliness <S%G763><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2886><s%> Worldly Desires, <S%G1939><s%> Discreetly <S%G4996><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Righteously <S%G1346><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Piously <S%G2153><s%> We Should Live <S%G2198><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Present <S%G3568><s%> Age, <S%G165><s%>

Awaiting <S%G4327><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> Hope <S%G1680><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Appearing <S%G2015><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%> Of Our <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Us, <S%G2257><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Might Redeem <S%G3084><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> From <S%G575><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Lawlessness, <S%G458><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Might Purify <S%G2511><s%> To Himself <S%G1438><s%> A People <S%G2992><s%> Peculiar, <S%G4041><s%> Zealous <S%G2207><s%> Of Good <S%G2570><s%> Works. <S%G2041><s%>

These Things <S%G5023><s%> Speak, <S%G2980><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Exhort, <S%G3870><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Convict <S%G1651><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Command. <S%G2003><s%> No One <S%G3367><s%> Thee <S%G4675><s%> Let Despise. <S%G4065><s%>
